Reviews.Title: “More like a hostel, but clean and decent”
Reviews.Author: qu_tee
Reviews.Content: hotel 15 minute walk berlin hauptbahnhof 5 minute walk nearest station u6 line time arrived late bit harder hotel own instead shares building ring buzzer reception s5 floor entry bit eerie dark believe larger floor ceiling entry doors windows obviously spacious size overall impression probably bit hostel hotel tv towels firm beds inbuilt body wash dispensers tea coffee facilities phone contact reception overall clean provided bare essentials tv arrived receptionist quick resolve free wifi available throughout building login codes reception location hotel bit city ok walk main city 2030 minutes train fairly easy 2 supermarkets 5 minute walk close 8pm subway food bit street didn’t pay hotel breakfast didn’t worth stuff supermarket instead

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable simple hotel near Berlin's centre”
Reviews.Author: MichaelScholl
Reviews.Content: stayed eastgate hotel weekend attend scientific symposium natural history museum museum berlin hotel perfectly located located hundred meters museum main reception 24 hours day located fifth floor building near terrace breakfast breakfast priced 75 euros buffet style catering everyones tastes single clean light comfortable windows space buildings desk cupboard ensuite bathroom hotel offered free highspeed wifi access greatly appreciated hotel situated 20 minutes easy walk centre berlin main tourist attractions definitely return stay hotel especially business purposes maybe romantic escapade

Reviews.Title: “Typical GDR Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Viktor K
Reviews.Content: located eastern berlin soviet style atmosphere hotel top floor building appartments staff former soviet poor clean breakfast nice eat else bathroom clean tidy hotel 10 minutes walking brandenburg gate

Reviews.Title: “Easy to explore the city”
Reviews.Author: pillang0
Reviews.Content: walking distance major attractions brandenburg gate reichstag topography terror unter den linden checkpoint berlin museum island etc easy access thr airport train hauptbahnhof 800 meters walk hotel situated 4th 5th floors building wonderful views city television tower reichstag simple comfortable shower staff friendly helpful finally recommend cheap price location comfortable

HotelInfo.Name: Mikon Eastgate Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Hessische Str 10, 10115 Berlin, Germany
